name.ja: マナドゥム・トリロスークダ

text.en:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can target 1 Level 2 Tuner in your GY; Special Summon it, but its effects are negated. You can target any number of Tuners you control; their Levels become 2, also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Synchro Monsters. You can only use each effect of "Mannadium Trilosukda" once per turn.
